messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT: Goats.....herbal care
messages.msgSnippet: The book is The Herbal Farm & Stable by Juliette D barkley Levy.  I own the book and look through it quite often.  I have wanted goats for forever but didn t
messages.messageBody:
The book is The Herbal Farm & Stable by Juliette D'barkley Levy.  I own the book and look through it quite often.  I have wanted goats for forever but didn't know how to deal with the milking issue and kid issue and getting rid of kids not wanted.  I couldn't do it.  I also thought that goats were more inclined to want to be with more than one goat?  Let me know if having one goat works out happily or not...I could still just get one as a pet...
linda
----- Original Message -----
From: Michelle Harper
To: wiseweeds@egroups.com ; witchy_Goddess_Circle@onelist.com ; Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 22, 2000 10:25 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT: Goats.....herbal care

I am soo excited, I finally convinced my husband to let me get a goat....she's beautiful....her on-line resources.....perhaps perhaps a Susan Weed site, or Juliette ?????what was that neat old woman last name, so I can get her book......Farm & Stable???? help me with this one......Thanks. Many Blessings. michelle
